overview: Third film about “Panther Head” from classical novel “Water Margin”.  In Cangzhou, prisoner Lin Chong befriends the nobleman Chai Jin. His impressive skill in thrashing a boastful and arrogant martial arts instructor, who lives off Chai, wins the scion's admiration. Chai provides him money to bribe the jailers not to make his life in prison miserable.
title: Leopard Head Lin Chong 3: Temple of the Mountain Gods
